text: Shiv Kumar Beria is an Indian politician and former Minister of Textile and Silk Industry in Akhilesh Yadav's cabinet. He was member of 10th, 11th, 12th, 14th and 16th Vidhan Sabha of Uttar Pradesh representing Rasulabad constituency of Kanpur Dehat district. ==References== * * Category:Uttar Pradesh politicians Category:Samajwadi Party politicians Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Janata Dal politicians Category:Pragatisheel Samajwadi Party (Lohiya) politicians
title: Shiv Kumar Beria
